statements: SELECT * FROM PeerReviewData;
SELECT id, review_date, decision FROM PeerReviewData;
SELECT paper_id, decision, review_date FROM PeerReviewData;
SELECT reviewer_id, paper_id FROM PeerReviewData WHERE decision = 'Accept';
SELECT reviewer_id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM PeerReviewData GROUP BY reviewer_id;
SELECT * FROM PeerReviewData WHERE decision = 'Accept'
SELECT reviewer_id, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM PeerReviewData GROUP BY reviewer_id
SELECT DISTINCT reviewer_id, paper_id FROM PeerReviewData WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM PeerReviewData ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT reviewer_id, AVG(LENGTH(decision)) AS avg_decision_length FROM PeerReviewData GROUP BY reviewer_id HAVING AVG(LENGTH(decision)) > 5
SELECT * FROM peer_reviews WHERE review_id = 'ec736c1b-f816-43a1-b83a-80475b091f14';
SELECT decision, comments FROM peer_reviews WHERE reviewer_id = '0cadf2f7-6ca0-45b4-ae1c-88fa133eb09b';
SELECT submission_id, submission_date, title FROM submissions WHERE author_id = 'cd5bf9bc-1ae0-4be6-a6fd-281f423ddf17';
SELECT review_id, reviewer_id, submission_id, review_date FROM peer_reviews WHERE decision = 'Accepted';
SELECT title, abstract FROM submissions WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM peer_reviews WHERE reviewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT submission_id, reviewer_id, review_date FROM peer_reviews WHERE decision = 'ACCEPTED' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT submission_id, title, author_id FROM submissions WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01' AND submission_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT author_id, title, abstract FROM submissions WHERE abstract ILIKE '%machine learning%' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT reviewer_id, review_date, decision, comments FROM peer_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM reviews
SELECT review_id, review_date, decision FROM reviews WHERE decision='Accepted'
SELECT submission_id, title FROM submissions ORDER BY submission_id DESC
SELECT reviewer_id, review_date FROM reviews WHERE reviewer_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM decisions WHERE decision_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date ASC
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT submission_id, title FROM submissions WHERE submission_date < '2022-05-01'
SELECT review_id, reviewer_id, decision FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT submissions.title, reviews.decision FROM submissions JOIN reviews ON submissions.submission_id = reviews.submission_id
SELECT DISTINCT decisions.reviewer_id, decisions.final_decision FROM decisions JOIN reviews ON decisions.review_id = reviews.review_id
SELECT * FROM review_decisions;
SELECT id, reviewer_id, decision FROM review_decisions ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT submission_id, decision FROM review_decisions WHERE reviewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT title, author, submission_date FROM submissions WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, organization FROM reviewers WHERE organization = 'Example Inc.';
SELECT * FROM review_decisions WHERE decision = 'Accepted';
SELECT id, decision, review_date FROM review_decisions WHERE review_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT submissions.title, reviewers.name FROM submissions JOIN reviewers ON submissions.author = reviewers.id;
SELECT submissions.title, submissions.author, reviews.review_text FROM submissions LEFT JOIN reviews ON submissions.id = reviews.submission_id;
SELECT * FROM submissions WHERE submission_date >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviews
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, reviewed_paper FROM reviews
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewed_paper, review_date FROM reviews WHERE decision='Accepted'
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewed_paper, review_date FROM reviews WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM papers
SELECT * FROM papers;
SELECT title, author FROM papers WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT reviewer_name, department FROM reviewers ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, review_date FROM reviews WHERE decision = 'Accepted' ORDER BY review_date DESC;

SELECT papers.title, reviewers.reviewer_name, reviews.decision FROM papers INNER JOIN reviews ON papers.title = reviews.reviewed_paper INNER JOIN reviewers ON reviewers.reviewer_name = reviews.reviewer_name WHERE reviews.decision = 'Accepted';
